metadata.title: CVE-2021-47093 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:platform/x86: intel_pmc_core: fix memleak on registration failure In casedevice registration fails during module initialisation, the platform devicestructure needs to be freed using platform_device_put() to properly freeall resources (e.g. the device name).

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
